Service Menu & Pricing

We are a full service bicycle shop that specializes in mountain bikes & suspension services. For a list of fork, shock and other component services, see our service menu.

Mail-in Service

In addition to in-person drop-off/pickup we offer mail-in service with quick turnaround. Typical turnaround is 2-3 days after receiving suspension pieces. Use our Use our Mail-In Contact Form.

Hours Of Operation

Due to Covid-19 concerns we will be operating by appointment only until further notice. We will be open for appointments during our current normal business hours. Please call or email to make an appointment. Thank you for your understanding.
